general.gigTitle: build squarespace website, design or development squarespace website

sellerCard.description: Hey! I'm a talented website designer and developer with years of extensive experiences. I design or redesign any type of website in the Squarespace website builder. I am here to help my clients to enhance their business. My superior priority is client's satisfaction. Also, I offer a comprehensive solution for website design, development, maintenance, updates, and SEO services. Let's connect to discuss how I can contribute to your project's success.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional, easy-to-use, and affordable website for your business? Or, do you want to showcase your products, services, skills online and reach more customers? 


If yes, then this gig is for you.


I am a skilled web designer specializing in Squarespace with years of experience. I can create or revamp a website on Squarespace that perfectly matches your business or brand.


I will develop a beautiful Squarespace website for your business, incorporating the latest web design, SEO, and trending techniques. My services include Squarespace website design for businesses, blogs, non-profits, portfolios, and more.


What I Will Provide:


  • Squarespace Website Design from Scratch
  • Modern, Professional, Responsive Layouts
  • Design & Redesign Existing Layout
  • Subscriber's Popup/ Contact Forms/ Social Links
  • Online Store Development
  • Eye-Catchy Color and Branding
  • Custom Coding where needed
  • Unlimited Revisions and Future Support


Why Choose Me?


  • Highly Experienced
  • 24/7 Customer Services
  • High Quality Work 
  • 30 Days of Free Support


Let's work together to bring your vision to life. Contact me today to discuss your project and get a free consultation!

slide.name: build squarespace website, design or development squarespace website

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to have come up with a domain name. Hosting will be done on Squarespace. Apart from that, you just need an idea of how your website should look like-preferably point me to a site you like. Iâ€™ll take over from there.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help me to choose a design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can help you to choose the best design, or I can design a custom website from scratch. So if you don't know which way to go, send me a message and I will help you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to update my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to edit the content and add new pages to your website. I will give you an instruction video if needed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer discounts?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If you have multiple projects, I will definitely offer you a discount.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer customer support after the delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we offer help for 30 days as well as guide you on how to fix some simple WordPress issues.

reviews.comment:
I recently had the pleasure of working with Ashrafuzzaman on redesigning my portfolio's landing page, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the outcome. From the outset, Ashrafuzzaman demonstrated exceptional professionalism and a keen understanding of my vision. He transformed my outdated page into a modern, user-friendly interface that truly reflects my personal brand.

Communication was seamless throughout the project. Ashrafuzzaman was always prompt in his responses, open to feedback, and provided valuable insights that enhanced the overall design. His technical expertise is evident, but it's his dedication to client satisfaction that sets him apart.

I've collaborated with several freelancers in the past, but Ashrafuzzaman stands out as one of my favorites. If you're looking for a skilled web developer who delivers outstanding results, I highly recommend Ashrafuzzaman.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your kind words. I am glad that you are happy with my work. It was a pleasure working with him, and I would love to work with him again. He is a great buyer.

reviews.comment: It was absolutely amazing to work with this developer! The absolute best website revisor ever!  I recommend him over anyone else! Look no further!

seller_response.comment: Great. Thank you for your appreciation. I'd love to work with you again.

reviews.comment: Ashrafuzzaman delivered a PROFESSIONAL website development service with outstanding attention to detail! The collaboration was seamless, thanks to his timely delivery, politeness, and quick responsiveness. Great communication throughout made the process even smoother. Highly recommend! ðŸ˜Š

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your appreciation.

reviews.comment: He was great. He made as many amendments as I needed and created a fantastic website for me. Would highly recommend and use again.

Exceptional understanding of what I want to accomplish that provides a service offering that is differentiated from other providers.  Prompt delivery and accommodated my edits as my service offering was evolving.  Easily worked with my recommendations for photo changes.  A pleasure to work with!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words and thoughtful review! It was an absolute pleasure collaborating with you and bringing your vision to life. I'm thrilled to hear that you found the process seamless and that I could adapt to your evolving needs. Your recommendations and input were invaluable in creating a final product that truly reflects your unique service offering. I look forward to the opportunity to work together again in the future!
